numbered_ace_sentences: 1. The NFL is a league.
2. The NBA is a league.
3. The WNBA is a league.
4. The MLS is a league.
5. The MLB is a league.
6. In these leagues, the majority of players are people of colour.
7. In these leagues, the majority of head coaches are not people of colour.
8. The NFL has the lowest percentage of head coaches of colour.
9. The MLS has the highest percentage of head coaches of colour.
10. We wonder why the percentage of head coaches of colour is very low.
11. The percentage of head coaches of colour is especially low in the MLB.
12. We wonder whether it is more difficult for a person of colour to be a head coach.
13. This situation shows that racism is evident in major league sports.
14. Some people of colour want to be head coaches.
15. These people may not have opportunities to become head coaches in the future.
16. The graph uses bar graphs.
17. The graph shows the percentage of players of colour in each league.
18. The graph shows the percentage of head coaches of colour in each league.
19. The graph compares these percentages across the NFL and the NBA and the WNBA and the MLB and the MLS.
20. In these leagues, many players are people of colour.
21. In these leagues, the percentage of head coaches of colour is low.
22. The headline is: Diversity in major league sports: the percentage of people-of-colour players and head coaches.
